text:
Hello, how do I make my prior ordered? MWE

```@model function gdemo(y)
    theta ~ filldist(Normal(1, 2),6)
    y .~ OrderedLogistic(0, theta) 
end```
To be specific, I want to order my `theta` priors for `OrderedLogistic` so `theta[6] > theta[5] > theta[4] > theta[3] > theta[2] > theta[1]` ?

If this isn't supported yet, is there any dirty workaround? I am stucked with this for a long time so I don't mind some workaround at the moment :eyes:
